name: The Catacombs of Deasis
description:
TCoD is in a very early stage of development. 

Features currently in the game are:
-First dungeon, known as The Crypt
-Music for 1 & 2 floor of The Crypt
-Equipment system with 8 slots (main hand, off hand, 6 trinket slots)

Future Updates will include:
-Town that acts as a home base
-More Dungeons
-More gear
-Music for 3rd level of The Crypt and future levels
-Crafting system (Is in game but broken)
